name: SASCOT - Camp Cassa
description:
SASCOT - CAMP CASSA

Small girl troublemaker Sienna Ascot is sent to Camp Cassa to learn better behaviour and social skills. However, she’s still going to do her best to make this boring camp a fun one.

Moonlight as a detective,  solve petty crimes, do petty crimes,  wreck businesses and beat up innocent people, all while trying to better yourself as a person.

----

We recommend playing this game with an Xbox controller!

----

Disclaimer:

There are likely to still be a number of bugs, hopefully you have a smooth experience. This project was made to test our ability to make a small game in the style of something larger that we want to make. It's not supposed to be polished, or a full game, but we still wanted it to be somewhat fun and interesting, in line with what we want our future "Mascot" game to look and feel like. 

Feedback is valuable to us, so if you have time, we've got a feedback form here: https://forms.gle/DmdjbnMwah7WT4eq6

Known Bugs etc

- mashing buttons too fast can sometimes break the game
